metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38865 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Certain The MPlayer Project products are vulnerable to Divide By Zero via the function demux_avi_read_packet of libmpdemux/demux_avi.c. This affects mplyer SVN-r38374-13.0.1 and mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38865` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.3.0-8+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
mplayer - 2:1.3.0-8+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.3.0-8+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.3.0-8+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
